attributes.action: support the strawberry line - "Safe Paths For All" campaign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Community groups from Clevedon to Cranmore in Somerset are planning to further convert the old Strawberry Line railway track into "Safe Paths For All". This will help the environment and benefit walkers, cyclists, disabled and wherever practical equestrians.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "support the strawberry line - "Safe Paths For All" campaign."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20771


Prime Minister's Office
